_sText:
A small project I devised when I was part of a surfing community.

Features:

1) No shotguns
2) Better game balance
3) No plantable bombsite; I added a bombsite which you cannot get to just so the rounds end.
4) More secrets
5) Totally new river ramp - Get speed to bunnyhop and open the jail from there!
6) No drowning in jail
7) Able to get out of jail whilst inside it
8) More fun! :D
